summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.0°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles) and dew point temperature (up 3.5°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; intensely hot, uncomfortable in direct sunlight. Also, air moisture should feel ok and a light breeze will be noticeable. Possible light showers, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and very bright daylight. Weather patterns to stay the same.
